variants.name: fft
variants.description: Enable the use of Intel MKL FFT/FFTW provider

description:
FLEUR (Full-potential Linearised augmented plane wave in EURope) is a
code family for calculating groundstate as well as excited-state
properties of solids within the context of density functional theory
(DFT).

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: There can only be one (MPI process)!

dependencies.name: fftw-api
dependencies.description:
FFTW (Fujitsu Optimized version) is a comprehensive collection of fast C
routines for computing the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) and various
special cases thereof. It is an open-source implementation of the Fast
Fourier transform algorithm. It can compute transforms of real and
complex-values arrays of arbitrary size and dimension. Fujitsu Optimized
FFTW is the optimized FFTW implementation targeted for A64FX CPUs. For
single precision build, please use precision value as float. Example :
spack install fujitsufftw precision=float

dependencies.name: libxc
dependencies.description:
Libxc is a library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-
functional theory.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: magma
dependencies.description:
The MAGMA project aims to develop a dense linear algebra library similar
to LAPACK but for heterogeneous/hybrid architectures, starting with
current "Multicore+GPU" systems.

dependencies.name: wannier90
dependencies.description:
Wannier90 calculates maximally-localised Wannier functions (MLWFs).
Wannier90 is released under the GNU General Public License.

dependencies.name: spfft
dependencies.description: Sparse 3D FFT library with MPI, OpenMP, CUDA and ROCm support.
